message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $180. I believe it offers a lot of value at this price. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $100 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $150. This is a very fair offer considering the value this product provides.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $150 is a bit too high. Would you be willing to meet me at $120, which is the price I can get from John?
